top_categories.workout_context: Eislek Gravel’s luxembourg ardennes, european gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Eislek Gravel isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Eislek Gravel rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Eislek Gravel when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Eislek Gravel’s luxembourg ardennes gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Eislek Gravel. Make this intensity feel like home.
Eislek Gravel’s luxembourg ardennes gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Eislek Gravel — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Eislek Gravel’s 5,500ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Eislek Gravel — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on luxembourg ardennes gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Eislek Gravel — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Eislek Gravel’s luxembourg ardennes gravel delivers on race day.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Eislek Gravel’s 70 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Eislek Gravel requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on luxembourg ardennes gravel to build confidence. Expect: luxembourg ardennes, european gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and TT Threshold to prepare you for 70 miles of luxembourg ardennes gravel in Luxembourg.
